Summary: very white bright light like shooting star sped, then stopped in sky
divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving with a friend on the 210 Freeway, heading west, when all of a sudden we saw a very bright white light in the sky above us shoot through at a very high speed. It was like a shooting star, but too bright and too low, and all of a sudden it stopped and faded in its luminosity, looking like a normal plane light, but it didn't seem to move like one. It stayed in the sky and seemed to travel slowly north.
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Glendora
There was one other sighting in Glendora on or around September 12th 2005
